Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: photocopier, newspapers, magazines, spoken word cassettes, videos, CDs and DVDs. Activities include children's activities and Story Time. Provides 4 People's Network computers with Microsoft Office and Internet access for public use.

DisabledAccess.entry: Disabled toilet in medical centre part of building

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 10am-12.30pm, 1.30-6pm, Tues & Thurs closed, Wed & Fri 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-6pm, Sat 9.30am-12.30pm (opening times); Wed at 10am (coffee morning), 2nd Wed in the month 4.30-5.30pm (Councillor's Surgery)
